name: Free-antivirus
body:
### Welcome to our free antivirus github page!
Here you can find more information about this product, download it, share it with friends and make mini - antivirus.
> You can visit our website [here](http://uaavts.p.ht/).
### How to make mini - antivirus
Hello there! My name is Yura K. and I tell you how to make mini antivirus in Visual Basic
***
**We need:**
***
2 buttons;
1 richtextbox;
1 openfiledialog
***
**Step 1**
***
First we need to does 1 left click on button 1 and set its name to Choose Folder.
Then, we need to does 1 left click on button 2 and set its name to Delete File.
***
**Step 2**
***
First we need to does 1 left click on button 2 and set value `enabled` to false in object properties.
Then, we need to does 1 left click on richtextbox1 and set value 'visible' to false in object properties.
***
**Step 3 - coding!**
***
First we need to does 2 left clicks on button 1 and write this code:
`
OpenFileDialog1.ShowDialog()
If OpenFileDialog1.SelectedFile = "" Then
           MsgBox("You does not select file to scan! Please, try again.", MsgBoxStyle.Information)
Else
           Dim A1 = new StreamReader(OpenFileDialog1.SelectedFile)
           RichTextBox1.Text = A1.ReadToEnd()
           If RichTextBox1.Contains("virus") Then
                      MsgBox("A Virus was found!")
                      Button2.Enabled = "True"
           End If
           If RichTextBox1.Contains("trojan") Then
                      MsgBox("A Virus was found!")
                      Button2.Enabled = "True"
           End If
End If
`
> Warning! You need add viruses after `RichTextBox1.Text = A1.ReadToEnd()` (examples is after it.)
Then, we need to does 2 left click on button2 and write this code:
`
My.Computer.FileSystem.DeleteFile(OpenFileDialog1.SelectedFile)
MsgBox("Virus was deleted. Your computer is now safe. This mini antivirus was built with http://uaavts.p.ht/")
`
Have fun!
